name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One True Check: Twitter Legacy Verified Users

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An unopinionated tool that displays a checkmark next to the name of each user who was verified with Twitter's legacy system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THIS IS A FREE TRIAL, YOU CAN PURCHASE THE COMPLETE VERSION IN THE EXTENSION ITSELF.

The full version can be purchased for a one-time fee of $1.99 USD within the extension; the free version consists of a 7-day trial.
